root.name: SpongeBob SquarePants: SuperSponge
root.description: The Game Boy Advance verson was released on December 31st 2002. The game was also released as part of a Nickelodeon 4 game compilation on March 14th 2007 Story Spongebob wants to get a autographed photo of Mermaid Man and Barnacle Boy for his friend Patrick for a birthday present. The two elderly superheros want nothing to do with Spongebob and instead they sent him to find random objects around Bikini Bottom.
